blurbs.headline: Are new features and products getting ignored?
blurbs.content: Smart marketers know that emails with high click-through rates that promote new products and features will lead to more sales. Connect your Easy Digital Downloads powered store to your favorite email marketing service to boost revenue.

blurbs.headline: Are you missing out on future revenue?
blurbs.content: On average, up to 60% of customers do not manually renew their license keys. That's lost revenue for your business. Enable subscriptions on your licensed products and keep the revenue flowing!

blurbs.headline: Are you giving things away for free?
blurbs.content: Lead magnets are the easiest way to capture potential customers. Use our Free Downloads add-on, and start capturing those leads today.

blurbs.headline: Who are your biggest fans?
blurbs.content: Did you know that 72% of customers say that a product review is the key to making their purchasing decision? Learn how to add reviews to your store, and let your happy customers be your brand ambassadors!
